Name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
Title: Xiao: Conqueror of Evil
Desc: Evil shall be dispersed, and the vile will be scattered.
Source: Reward for inviting Xiao to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1504]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1504] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S15043]</color> once.
While your $[A1504] has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115041]</color> attached, your use of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S15042]</color> will cost 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo Die</color>. (Every attachment of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115041]</color> allows the effect to be triggered twice)
(You must have $[A1504] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C115041.Name: Yaksha's Mask
C115041.Desc:
The character to which this is attached has their $[K100] dealt converted to $[K105], and they will deal +1 $[K105].
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached uses a $[K52]:</color> +2 additional DMG.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>If the character this card is attached to is the active character, when you perform "Switch Character":</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

K105.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>
K105.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

K52.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Plunging Attack</color>
K52.Desc: After a character is switched in to be the Active Character, should their next Combat Action within this Round be a Normal Attack, it will be considered a Plunging Attack for the instance.

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
